metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29651 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A denial of service via regular expression in the py.path.svnwc component of py (aka python-py) through 1.9.0 could be used by attackers to cause a compute-time denial of service attack by supplying malicious input to the blame functionality.

criterions.comment: python-py: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
